channel.title: No CD crack for Rise and Fall: Civilizations at War?
channel.description:
I just downloaded a torrent of it, but I cannot find a no CD crack. I have searched Google, Gamecopyworld, and even read all the comments on a few torrent sites that have it available. None seem to have anything that will work.
Out of deperation, I even removed my DVD RW drive from my laptop, and mounted it wil Daemon tools to virual drive D:, yet it still doesn't work. I tried copying the .exe from the demo version (that works on some games), and even that didnt work. I would really appreciate it if someone could shine some light on the situation.

item.title: No CD crack for Rise and Fall: Civilizations at War?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Well… It uses Starforce 3.7 for the protection, which actually installs its own drivers. This one may be pretty hard to crack.

This is bugging me. I REALLY want this game, but I am broke and cannot afford it.

Read full topic
item.source: No CD crack for Rise and Fall: Civilizations at War?

item.title: No CD crack for Rise and Fall: Civilizations at War?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

i hate it when that happens. I would say search google and torrents, but since youve done both of those, maybe nobodys ever made one (or made a public release of one) yet. Its a nutbuster trying to find no cd cracks, i always end up pissed off when trying to find one
